sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_twilio_direct.TwimlModel</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>TwimlModel</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TwimlModel = Class.create();
TwimlModel.prototype = {
    initialize: function(tagName, level) {
		this._tagName = tagName;
		this._attributes = {};
		this._text = '';
		this._level = level;
		this._children = [];
    },

	getLastChild: function () {
		if (this._children.length > 0)
			return this._children[this._children.length - 1];
	},

	getTagName: function () {
		return this._tagName;
	},

	toString: function () {
		var s = '';
		for (var i = 0; i < this._level; i++)
			s+= ' ';
		s += this._tagName + '[';
		for (var attr in this._attributes) {
			s += attr + '=' + this._attributes[attr] + ',';
		}
		s += ']\n';
		this._children.forEach(function (c) {
			s += c.toString();
		});
		return s;
	},
	
	toXml: function () {
		var x = new XMLDocument2();
		this.makeXml(x);
		return x.toString();
	},
	
	makeXml: function (xmlDoc) {
		var t;
		if (this._text)
			t = xmlDoc.createElementWithTextValue(this._tagName, this._text);
		else
			t = xmlDoc.createElement(this._tagName);
		for (var attr in this._attributes) {
			t.setAttribute(attr, this._attributes[attr]);
		}
		if (this._children.length) {
			xmlDoc.setCurrentElement(t);
			this._children.forEach(function (c) {
				c.makeXml(xmlDoc);
				xmlDoc.setCurrentElement(t);
			});
		}
	},

    type: 'TwimlModel'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-05-25 12:57:50</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2c20e06d87961300b18a046787cb0b32</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>TwimlModel</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Twilio Direct Driver" source="sn_twilio_direct">3981f1d387021300b18a046787cb0b1d</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Twilio Direct Driver">3981f1d387021300b18a046787cb0b1d</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2c20e06d87961300b18a046787cb0b32</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-08-20 15:36:46</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
